context_bundle.summary: Security Misconfiguration (OWASP A05:2021): Insecure defaults, incomplete setups, verbose error messages. Fix: automate secure deployments, use minimal platform without unnecessary features, change all default credentials, disable debug in production, implement proper error handling that doesn't leak stack traces.

onboarding.quick_start: Secure config: 1) Automate deployments with hardened baselines, 2) Disable/remove unnecessary features/frameworks, 3) Change ALL default passwords and keys, 4) Disable verbose errors in production (no stack traces), 5) Set security headers (HSTS, X-Frame-Options, CSP).
common_patterns: Production error handling: return generic 'Internal Server Error', log details server-side only
Disable directory listing: Nginx autoindex off; Apache Options -Indexes
Environment segregation: Separate configs for dev/staging/prod

known_errors.error: Stack trace exposed in production error response
known_errors.cause: Debug mode enabled or missing error handler
known_errors.solution: Set DEBUG=false, implement custom error handler returning generic messages

known_errors.cause: Installation defaults not changed during setup
known_errors.solution: Force password change on first login, audit all service accounts
known_errors.prevention: Automated deployment scripts that generate unique credentials
